text: Seven Winds () is a 1962 Soviet drama movie directed by Stanislav Rostotsky.«Вокруг были кровавые бинты». Как будущие звезды выживали в войнуНА СЕМИ ВЕТРАХ (1962) It stars Larisa Luzhina, Sofiya Pilyavskaya, and Vyacheslav Tikhonov. == Actors == * Larisa Luzhina as Svetlana Ivashova * Sofiya Pilyavskaya * Vyacheslav Tikhonov as Capt. Suzdalev * Klara Luchko as Doctor Natalia Guseva * Vladimir Zamanskiy * Vyacheslav Nevinnyy == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1962 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Seven Winds
